summary.headline: Tiered Pricing is 15% more profitable than current pricing strategy

drivers: Revenue impact of £2.4M annually with tiered approach
Customer retention improves by 12% with clearer value proposition

summary.headline: Staged Rollout reduces risk by 40% while maintaining 85% of full launch impact

drivers: Risk mitigation through controlled geographic expansion
User feedback quality increases by 60% in staged approach
Revenue impact delayed by 2 months but more sustainable

summary.headline: SaaS solution provides 30% faster time-to-value despite higher ongoing costs

drivers: Total cost of ownership £1.8M over 3 years vs £2.2M for internal build
Time-to-market advantage of 6 months with proven SaaS platform
Reduced technical risk and vendor support reliability
